channel.title: King Sitting on the Throne During Executions
channel.description:
Just a visual thing this time, nothing mechanical. During executions the King should be sitting on the Throne; right in between the accuser and the accused. I think it would look rad.
On the chance that the King gets the execute animation, obviously the Throne should be empty.
Rate. Like. Subscribe.
Thanks in advance.
